price: Nayo ni Jahannamu!  Wataingia, Maovu yaliyoje makaazi hayo!
footnotes: Na nyumba hiyo ndiyo Jahannamu wakiteswa kwa uvukuto wake. Na makaazi maovu mno ni Jahannamu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
